direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting jsoup nodes to W3C nodes, but 'fromJsoup' converts a whole jsoup element or document to a W3C document.
Both methods interact with W3C nodes and involve querying or retrieving nodes from a W3C document.
Both methods depend on W3C documents and involve operations that can affect the state or content of these documents.
Both methods involve converting jsoup nodes to W3C nodes with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with W3C documents and involve retrieving or setting context nodes within these documents.
